altTitles.ja: 奴隷を調教してハーレム作る

altTitles.pt-br: Treinando escravas pra fazer um harem

altTitles.en: Training Slaves to Make a Harem

altTitles.es-la: Entrenando Esclavas Para Hacer Un Harem

description.en: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về gã chủ nhân mua nô lệ, chăm sóc giáo dục các bé lên người để hiện thực hoá giấc mơ dàn harem lý tưởng
description.es-la: Un hombre compra 3 esclavas Lolis para así poder criarlas y convertirlas en mujeres de su agrado para que posteriormente cuando crezcan completamente de acuerdo a sus gustos pueda hacerles el sin respeto a gusto las veces que quiera
description.pt-br: Um homem compra três pequenas escravas e começa a transformá-las em garotas perfeitas para seu harém.

altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

altTitles.pt-br: Não É Minha Culpa Não Ser Popular!

description.en:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.
description.pt-br:
Tomoko Kuroki naturalmente presumiu que ela seria popular quando chegasse ao ensino médio... mas então a realidade fria e dura se abateu para o ataque! Acontece que todos os pontos de popularidade que ela acumulou em seus simuladores de namoro de videogame valem a pena na vida real, e Tomoko está longe de estar preparada para passar pelo ensino médio!

Como ela pode esperar impressionar seus colegas quando ela nem consegue falar com eles?! Nasce uma nova heroína do ensino médio (talvez?)!

altTitles.ja: パンをナメるな！
パンナメ

description.en:
No education, no work experience, no friends.
Muyu Uchiki is a nineteen-year old girl who's been a shut-in for two years, she lives a self-indulgent life, but a turning point comes for her?!
She gets a call from her aunt in Kamakura about helping out at her bakery.
A heartwarming comedy about a girl struggling in a bakery in Kamakura!

Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

title.en: Ore ni Trauma wo Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desu ga Teokure desu

altTitles.ja: 俺にトラウマを与えた女子達がチラチラ見てくるけど、残念ですが手遅れです

altTitles.en: The Girls Who Traumatized Me Keeps Glancing at Me, but Alas, It’s Too Late

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas que me traumaron me están mirando, pero desafortunadamente es demasiado tarde.

description.en:
Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. 

He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. 

Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?! 

Thus commence a youthful romcom full of misunderstandings!
description.ja: 九重雪兎は昔から女運が悪い。両想いだと思っていた幼馴染にはフラれ、姉には嫌われ、母親には疎まれ――度重なるトラウマの果てに感情がぶっ壊れてしまう。そんな雪兎が高校に入学したら、彼にトラウマを与えてきた女子達がやたらと彼のことを気にかけてきて……!?　手遅れから始まる勘違い思春期ラブコメ、開幕！
description.es-la:
Yukito Kokonoe siempre ha tenido mala suerte. Es odiado por su madre, su hermana, y su amiga de la infancia, pensaba que tenían sentimientos mutuos, pero ella se siente frustrada antes de la confesión, e incluso hace travesuras durante sus heridas, y sus emociones se rompen después de repetidos traumas con muchas mujeres.

Sin embargo, cuando ingresó a la escuela preparatoria, ¿¡Las chicas que lo traumatizaron comenzaron a preocuparse por él ...!?
Esta es una comedia romántica de un adolescente incomprendido que comienza demasiado tarde.

altTitles.en: I Wanted to be Hurt by Love
You Loved Me So Much It Hurt

altTitles.ru: Я хотела бы быть обиженной твоей любовью

altTitles.ja: 君に愛されて痛かった

description.en:
Kanae is a girl who is struggling to fit in with the popular clique at her high school. Because she had been bullied in middle school, she has developed an acute inferiority complex that had led her to engage in questionable after-school activities in order to feel wanted.   
  
In comes Hiroshi, a high-school baseball star who became drawn to her after finding her crying during a group date at a karaoke bar. Thus begins an unhealthy relationship between a mentally unstable high-school girl and a jock.  


---
description.pt: Kanae é uma garota que está lutando pra se encaixar no grupo popular de sua escola. Devido ao bullying que sofreu durante o ensino fundamental, ela desenvolveu um intenso complexo de inferioridade, o que a levou a praticar atividades questionáveis depois das aulas, tudo para sentir-se desejada.

description.en:
Are you saying you're going to steal me because you're such a bastard?
Kim Ye-seul, who transfers to a new school, is admired by Iljin Jin So-hee from the first day. But Ye-seul doesn’t care about this. Rather, she takes off her thick glasses and puts on heavy makeup, revealing a face that looks just like So-hee. Ye-seul provokes So-hee. She begins to ‘take her place’.

Chris, a detective specializing in serious crimes, has been pursuing the culprit of a murder case for five years. During his investigation, he is unexpectedly saved by Anton.
"Who are you, really?"
"If you're curious, spend the night with me."
Everything about their relationship is suspicious, yet Chris finds himself irresistibly drawn to Anton.

Goyu possesses a unique ability: when he smells a scent associated with a memory, he can see past memories vividly. The problem is, whenever he catches a whiff of such a scent, his consciousness is pulled into the past, leaving his physical body frozen in place, dazed and unresponsive. One day, this ability almost leads to a disaster when Goyu is nearly hit by a car. Fortunately, Yoohan jumps in and saves him just in time. Goyu then discovers that when he is near Yoohan, the scents manifest as visible forms, allowing him to avoid getting lost in his memories.

altTitles.ja: ツギハギだらけの最強勇者

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi hagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha

description.en: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
description.ja: 【異世界×グロ×バトル】　転生先は、まさかのゾンビ！？　勇者ゾンビとして魔王討伐の旅に出るも、《力》の使用には《代償》が必要で…？　異世界系ダークファンタジー

altTitles.ja: 墜落JKと廃人教師

description.en:
Mikoto Ochiai is ready to jump off the rooftop of her high school's building after she got rejected by the boy she loves. However, homeroom teacher Jin Haiba suddenly appears on the rooftop for a smoke, talked to her, and saved her from falling down. He even asked her to go out with him rather than die.   
  
A black comedy manga about love, life, and death.
description.es-la:
Mikoto Ochiai está pronto para pular do telhado do colégio depois que ela foi rejeitada pelo garoto que ama. Porém, o professor dela, Jin Haiba, repentinamente aparece para fumar no telhado onde a convenceu a não pular e ainda pediu para sair com ele.  
  
Um mangá com humor pesado, sobre amor, vida, e morte

altTitles.ja: キモオタ、アイドルやるってよ

description.en: "When I woke up this morning there was a beautiful girl, but that was… me!?" - Idol Otaku Aisaka Yousuke wakes up one morning and realizes he's now a beautiful girl named Aisaka Yoko. Now with his new appearance and his great Idol knowledge, he will attempt to become the number one idol.

A TYPE-MOON staff member artist Takenashi Eri has created many side stories to most of the group's projects; 'Tsukihime' & 'Kagetsu Tohya', 'MELTY BLOOD', 'Fate/stay night' – you'll find your favorite characters in various hilarious situations that weren't covered by any of the original products.

She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels.  
  
Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing.  
  
Special Chapters:  
  
bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010)  
Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016)  
Give it Away (March 15, 2017)  
Hello Again (November 8, 2017)
description.pt-br:
Ela é uma estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio com uma única pergunta que a consome: será que o garoto de quem ela gosta realmente a notará? Ele é o delinquente juvenil mais notório da escola e de repente chega a uma conclusão chocante: ele tem uma paixão enorme e agora deve contar a ela como se sente.

O capítulo 232 não existe, não falta nenhum capítulo.

Capítulos Especiais:

bb1 E aí, doutor (9 de fevereiro de 2010)
Diamantes por dentro (30 de novembro de 2016)
Como percebeu (15 de março de 2017)
Olá de novo (8 de novembro de 2017)

description.en:
Sunghoon was a normal high schooler until one day, he finds out he is engaged to a tiger from Korean mythology. It is foretold that the world will end unless Sunghoon marries the tiger. This story begins with the cute smile of the tiger girl.  
  
*Notice: This series reads like a manga, from right-to-left.*

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

title.en: Kusobitch na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusobitch na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Kusobicchi na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane o Wakaraseru Hanashi
Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Bitchy Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

altTitles.ja: 安達としまむら

description.en: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
description.ja: 入間人間が書く電撃文庫の大人気作品『安達としまむら』。TVアニメ化決定の本作を新鋭・柚原もけがコミカライズ！女子校生2人のゆる～い日常をご堪能ください。
description.ru: В середине учебного дня, на втором этаже спортзала. Именно туда эти двое пришли пропустить занятия, и именно там началась их дружба.

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…
4-koma based on the mobile game Guns Girl Z (Houkai Gakuen / Houkai Gakuen 2).

altTitles.ja: マジンガーZ

description.en:
An alternate Mazinger Z manga by OUTA Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by NAGAI Go.  
  
It follows the anime timeline of events.

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou to Akuyaku Reisoku ga, Deatte Koi ni Ochitanara ~Nanashi no Seirei to Keiyaku shite Oidasareta Reijou wa, Kyou mo Reisoku to Kisoiatte Iru you desu~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢と悪役令息が、出逢って恋に落ちたなら　～名無しの精霊と契約して追い出された令嬢は、今日も令息と競い合っているようです～

altTitles.en: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love
If the Villainess and the Villain Were to Meet and Fall in Love: It Seems the Shunned Heroine Who Formed a Contract With an Unnamed Spirit Is Fighting With the Nobleman Yet Again

description.en:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)
description.ja: 幼い頃に最弱精霊と契約してしまった落ちこぼれ令嬢ブリジット。ある日、第三王子から婚約破棄を言い渡され、絶望の淵に立たされる。そんな中、彼女は孤高の天才令息ユーリと遭遇する。嫌われ者同士いがみ合う二人であったが、この出逢いが運命を動かすこととなり――。

title.en: Katainaka no Ossan, Kensei ni Naru: Tada no Inaka no Kenjutsu Shihan Datta noni, Taisei shita Deshi-tachi ga Ore wo Hottekurenai Ken

altTitles.en: From Old Country Bumpkin to Master Swordsman: My Hotshot Disciples Are All Grown Up Now, and They Won’t Leave Me Alone

altTitles.ja: 片田舎のおっさん、剣聖になる～ただの田舎の剣術師範だったのに、大成した弟子たちが俺を放ってくれない件～

altTitles.zh-hk: 鄉下的大叔成為劍聖～只不過是鄉下的劍術老師，但功成名就的弟子們不放過我的事～

altTitles.ru: Мужчина средних лет из глубинки становится мастером меча. «Я был просто сельским учителем фехтования, но мои преуспевшие ученицы не захотели оставить меня в покое!»

description.en:
Beryl Gardinant, a self-proclaimed "humble old man," is a sword instructor at his dojo in a rural, backwater village. In his younger years, he dreamed of glory as a master swordsman, but those days are long behind him. 

Out of the blue, he receives a visit from a famous former pupil who brings him world-shattering news - he’s been appointed as a special instructor for the knights of the Liberion Order! With his life now turned upside down, Beryl travels to the capital and reunites with some of his former students: elite knights, an ace wizard, and even an adventurer who’s attained the highest guild rank possible. 

But why do they all want his tutelage?! As far as he’s concerned, they clearly don’t need him anymore. 

Can Beryl live up to his new position? And will he ever get a moment’s peace away from his adoring students?!

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)
description.ja: 「ベリル先生を騎士団付きの特別指南役として推薦しました」。片田舎の村で細々と剣術道場を営む男、ベリル・ガーデナント。そこへ若き王国騎士団長に昇り詰めたかつての教え子、アリューシアが訪れ騎士団付きの特別指南役として王都へ行く事に。大成した弟子達と再会し、盛り立てられるベリルの運命は?おっさん成り上がりファンタジーの決定版、コミカライズ!

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

title.en: Isso Anata ga Todome wo Sashite

altTitles.ja: いっそあなたがトドメを刺して

altTitles.ja-ro: Isso Anata ga Todome o Sashite

altTitles.en: Better You Give Me The Final Blow

description.en:
Ichika is a female college student who wants to have a normal relationship, but is often judged by her appearance. One night at a drinking party she attended, hoping to have a wonderful encounter, she met Kousei who was kind to her. She is attracted to him because they got the same interest, enjoys talking with him and he likes her just the way she is — but she didn't know he had a secret no one knows about. 

(Source: heartbuzz2d)
description.pt-br: Ichika é uma estudante universitária do sexo feminino que deseja ter um relacionamento normal, mas muitas vezes é julgada pela sua aparência. Uma noite, numa festa em que ela participou, esperando ter um encontro maravilhoso, ela conheceu Kousei, que foi gentil com ela. Ela se sente atraída por ele porque eles têm os mesmos interesses, gosta de conversar com ele e ele gosta dela do jeito que ela é — mas ela não sabia que ele tinha um segredo que ninguém conhece.

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

description.en: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. (Source: [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

title.en: Beneath the Surviving Princess' Joyful Façade

altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

altTitles.es-la: Detrás de la sonrisa de la reina superviviente

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

title.en: Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: 降り積もれ孤独な死よ

description.en:
The latest work from the "My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought" duo, a blockbuster crime suspense series that has sold over 1 million copies!

Detective Saeki Jin of the Tomizayama South Police Station receives a report of a burglary and heads for a mansion that stands tall on a mountain. However, as he proceeds with his investigation, he discovers a shocking fact. A shiver runs through the investigators...! A noir suspense of passion and lamentation, depicting a detective confronting a bloody madness, is about to begin!

title.en: Whisper Me a Love Song Official Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: ささやくように恋を唄う　公式コミックアンソロジー

description.en: After graduating from the police academy and being commissioned as an Inspector, Jiyong investigates the suspicious complainant Hwang Seong-gu and encounters a nationwide rental scam case. As Jiyong pursues the rental scam gang that evades proper legal judgment, he feels his vigilante rules being tested. And in the meantime, the four vigilantes involved receive threats from someone aware of their identities. They begin to sense the shadow of a great evil behind their adversaries.

title.en: Proficient in recovery spells and suddenly invincible

altTitles.zh: 精通回复法术突然无敌了

altTitles.th: เชี่ยวชาญในการร่ายคาถาฟื้นฟูจะให้เธออยู่ยงคงกระพันทันที

altTitles.zh-ro: Chủ nhân của palmistry đột nhiên trở nên bất khả chiến bại Những ngôi sao đang sống

altTitles.tr: Mastering Recovery Spells and Suddenly became Invincible

description.en: Doctor Ling Fan traveled through the world of immortal cultivation. Because his qualifications for cultivating immortals were extremely poor, he did not adopt the traditional cultivation and promotion process. Instead, he went in the opposite direction and studied the recovery spell in depth. After repeated experiments, he finally mastered the recovery spell.

The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

altTitles.ja: 皇帝と女騎士

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế và Nữ hiệp sĩ

description.en:
Pollyanna is an unremarkable girl in a noble family. Her parents send her to military conscription hoping she'll die quickly in battle. Left only with her wits and her strength, Pollyanna fights to rise up in the ranks. One day, she meets an ardent king, one who finally acknowledges her worth. Moved by his dream for unity, Pollyanna vows to fight for him. But now the young king is slowly realizing this stalwart knight has also conquered his heart.

---
After six years of pointless war between her country, the Kingdom of Ehas, and their neighbor enemies, the Kingdom of Cukda, aged 20, the woman soldier and former petty officer Pauliana Kellenbell has been defeated and captured in a storming attack by the army of another enemy nation, the Kingdom of Acrea, an attack she had personally predicted but fell on deaf ears by her superiors. She has been desperately trying to survive in men's society, but it was all in vain, her noble birthright having been taken away by her family by being sent to war, and having all her efforts crushed down by the fact that she's a woman in the all-male army of Ehas.

Acrea's young king, Lucius, sees her struggle and potential, and makes an unexpected offer. He dreams of becoming the first emperor to conquer the South continent and its sea. Pauliana swears a life-long allegiance to Lucius for acknowledging her, becoming his knight and most trusted advisor, bestowing her with the name Pauliana Winter. However, in the end, Lucius is just an emperor on the battlefield that had awakened his love for Pauliana!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%99%80-%EC%97%AC%EA%B8%B0%EC%82%AC/2332), [KakaoPage](http://page.kakao.com/home/52250831)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/162), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-knight-and-her-emperor/info), [Tappytoon](http://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-knight-and-her-emperor)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6561/)
* [French / Français](http://www.verytoon.com/serie/l-armure-et-la-couronne/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kaisar-dan-Kesatria-Wanita/230)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/14567)
description.ja:
前妻との娘である「ポリアナ」は家族にとってただの邪魔もの――。
父はポリアナが戦死することを望み強制的に戦場に行かせるのだが…自分を見捨てた親への復讐と生き残るため必死に訓練し、疲弊した戦地の男世界でも耐えぬくポリアナ。
しかし、敵国の新王「ルクソス」が率いるアクレア軍の侵攻により、ポリアナは絶体絶命の危機に――!?
description.ko: “오늘따라 경이 귀여워 보이는구나.” “폐하, 어디 불편하십니까?” 미모와 능력을 갖춘 대륙의 패왕, 남자보다 거친 여기사에게 반하다?! 전우애가 연애로 발전하기까지, 진중함과 유머의 황금비로 풀어내는 새로운 스타일의 ‘여기사 로망’! 때는 전시, 여기사 폴리아나는 적국 아크레아의 군대에 패배한다. 그녀는 남자들의 사회에서 살아남기 위해 필사적으로 노력해 왔으나 이제는 허망히 죽을 신세. 하지만 아크레아의 젊은 왕 룩소스 1세는 그녀의 사투를 보고 뜻밖
description.tr: Pauliana, düşman ulus ordusu Acrea tarafından yenildi ve yakalandı. Umutsuzca erkekler toplumunda hayatta kalmaya çalışıyordu, ama hepsi boşunaydı. Acrea’nın genç kralı Lucius, mücadelesine tanık oldu ve beklenmedik bir teklifte bulundu. Onun hayali savaşı sürdürmek ve Güney kıtasını ve denizini fetheden ilk imparator olabilmekiti. Pauliana, Lucius’a, onu kabul ettiği için ömür boyu sürecek bir bağlılık sözü verdi. Ancak, sonunda, Lucius sadece Pauliana’ya olan sevgisini savaş alanında uyandırmiş bir imparatordu.
description.uk:
Пауліану подолали, і вона була захоплена у полон армією ворожої країни Акрії. Вона відчайдушно намагалася вижити в чоловічому товаристві, але все було марно. Молодий король Акрії, Люціус, побачив її боротьбу та зробив неочікувану пропозицію. Він мріє продовжити війну та стати першим імператором, що скорить Південний континент і море. Пауліана присягнула на вірність Люціусу за те, що він її визнав. Однак, зрештою, Люціус - просто імператор, який на полі бою усвідомив свої почуття до Пауліани.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%99%80-%EC%97%AC%EA%B8%B0%EC%82%AC/2332), [KakaoPage](http://page.kakao.com/home/52250831)

**Official Translations:**

* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6561/)
* [French / Français](http://www.verytoon.com/serie/l-armure-et-la-couronne/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kaisar-dan-Kesatria-Wanita/230)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/14567)
description.zh:
称霸大陆的皇帝，居然爱上了比自己还要强悍的女骑士！ 雅娜是一心为皇帝献出忠诚的骑士，面对皇帝突如其来的爱意，超飒的她会怎么应对呢？ 

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%99%80-%EC%97%AC%EA%B8%B0%EC%82%AC/2332), [KakaoPage](http://page.kakao.com/home/52250831)

**Official Translations:**

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere ka to Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en: A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...

altTitles.ja: 怪獣カムイ

description.en:
A mysterious gigantic creature called “Shindo” suddenly appeared and enveloped Japan in fear. At the cost of many lives, a nuclear bomb was successfully used to halt its movement. However, following the incident with Shindo, giant creatures began to emerge all over the world. And once again, they appeared in Japan…

A young man named Shidou Yamato, drafted into the battlefield, fought valiantly with his inherent skills, but found himself powerless against the overwhelming threat. Amidst this, the Special Headquarters For Countering Gigantic Creatures, “Shinonome”, approached Yamato with a proposal. What path did humanity choose to fight against the monsters…!?
___
[Alt Official Raw (MagaPoke)](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550689798796295480)

altTitles.ja: アウトサイダー パラダイス

description.en: From the author of Asobi Asobase comes a new comedy series, about… the Art Club from Asobi Asobase.

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

description.en: On the first day of school, six students felt their hearts flutter all at the very same moment in time! This is the story of each of them pursuing and being pursued out of their earnest wishes for love.

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

altTitles.en: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир!

altTitles.th: ขอให้โชคดีมีชัยในโลกแฟนตาซี

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！

altTitles.zh: 为美好的世界献上祝福！

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

title.en: N Methods to Make the Scum Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zha Nan Gameover De N Zhong Fang Fa

altTitles.vi: Tôi Ở Di Giới Khai Ngư Đường
N Cách Để Khiến Tra Nam Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhā Nán Gameover De N Zhǒng Fāng Fǎ

description.en: I fell from a building strangely when I appeared? Am I dead or alive after falling from the 18th floor? Suddenly an NPC wanted to play a game with me? I quickly traveled to various novels, met a lot of handsome men, activated the cheat code to kill all the scum, and completed the mission in the other world to come back to life? Wait a minute! Why am I in hard mode when I first arrive? !

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

title.en: A Blank Slate Regression for the Idol That Lost His Original Mindset

altTitles.ko: 초심 잃은 아이돌을 위한 회귀 백서

description.en:
‘I want to do real music now instead of these fxxking idol songs.’

Yoon Eden, an idol in his 8th year, was tired of working with his shitty agency so he worked on the side as a composer.
He succeeded in music composition and bought a house in Cheongdam-dong, but has become an arrogant celebrity.

[Your 30,000th fan is disappointed in you.]
[Starting a project to help idols regain their lost, original intentions!]

But what the hell? He was sent to his debut days when his group was at its lowest to find his original intentions-

[The conditions have been met.]
[You have disappointed 30 thousand fans, now make 30 million fans happy!]

There’s even a mission that's only possible to complete for 1st tier idols?!

“Fuck, my Cheongdam-dong house! My billion-dollar royalties! My Ferrari!”

[Profanity detected.] [Original Intent -2]

[When Original Intent falls to 0, you start over again!]

Even in these harsh conditions that threaten infinite regression, will the project help this idol find his lost, original intentions?
description.ko:
‘이제는 아이돌 노래 말고 real music을 하고 싶다.’

똥망 소속사에 지쳐 작곡 부업을 뛰던 8년 차 아이돌 윤이든.
청담동 내집마련엔 성공했지만, 예술병이 세게 찾아왔다?

[3만 번째 팬이 당신에게 실망했습니다.]
[초심 잃은 아이돌을 위한 초심 되찾기 프로젝트를 시작합니다!]

그런데 웬걸. 팀 탈퇴를 앞둔 그에게 초심을 찾으라며
망돌이었던 데뷔 초 시절로 보내진 것도 모자라-

[프로젝트의 완결을 위해서는 필수 조건을 충족해야 합니다.]
[3만 명의 팬들을 실망시킨 당신, 3천만 명의 팬들을 기쁘게 만들어라!]

1군 아이돌로 성공해야 하는 미션까지 주어지는데?!

“X발, 내 청담동 집! 내 억대 저작권료! 내 페라리!”

[비속어가 감지되었습니다.] [초심도 -2]
[※초심도가 0이 되면 다시 시작합니다!]

심지어 실패하면 무한 회귀가 기다리고 있는 극악의 조건 속
초심 잃은 아이돌의 초심 되찾기 프로젝트는 무사히 성공할 수 있을까?
